purpose: To provide a universal MCP-Server that facilitates efficient database management and interaction for LLMs and AI-Agents.
principle: Built using Go, it leverages REST APIs and integrates with multiple databases to serve as a middleware communication protocol server.
reusability: Offers a REST API for easy integration with various databases and supports multiple AI platforms for enhanced versatility.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, which may imply potential instability and limited feature set.
name: gateway
description: Universal MCP-Server for your Databases optimized for LLMs and AI-Agents.
highlight: Optimized for seamless integration with LLMs and AI-Agents for database management.
